text: TWT may refer to: * Sanga-Sanga Airport (IATA code: TWT), an airport serving the general area of Bongao, the capital of the province of Tawi-Tawi in the Philippines * Ted Williams Tunnel, the third highway tunnel under Boston Harbor in Boston * Traveling-wave tube, a specialized vacuum tube that is used in electronics to amplify radio frequency signals in the microwave range * The World Tomorrow, a defunct American political magazine
title: TWT
